body:
# COCOL!

[![Build Status](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/cocol-project/cocol/weekly)](https://github.com/cocol-project/cocol/actions) ![Stability Experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/Stability-Experimental-orange.svg?style=flat-square) ![Crystal 0.27.2](https://img.shields.io/badge/Crystal-0.32.1-blue.svg?style=flat-square&link=https://crystal-lang.org&link=https://crystal-lang.org/api/0.32.1/) ![License MPL-2.0](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MPL--2.0-green.svg?style=flat-square)


---

  ![https://github.com/cocol-project/cocol/blob/master/img/demo2.gif](https://github.com/cocol-project/cocol/blob/master/img/demo2.gif)

---

## About üåê
The Cocol Project has the goal to lower the entry barrier for developers interested in building blockchains and dApps.
There is still a long way to go and your help is needed.

## Installation üèπ
Cocol is written in [Crystal](https://crystal-lang.org/), so make sure to follow the [installation instructions](https://crystal-lang.org/reference/installation/) first.

After setting up Crystal you can clone the Cocol repository and install the dependencies:
```shell
> git clone https://github.com/cocol-project/cocol.git
> cd cocol
> shards install
```

## Usage ‚öî
Make your changes to the code-base and than build Cocol
```shell
> make
```
The binary `./cocol` offers the following CLI options

```text
Options:

-p --port            The port your Cocol node is going to run on
-m --master          Making this node a master (there can only be one)
--max-connections    Setting the max-connections for peers.
--miner              Making this node a miner
--update             Triggering an update on launch (will catch up with the current height)

```

There is also a script that starts multiple nodes and the master for you

```shell
> ./script/start.sh 66 5
```
First option is the amount of nodes and the second amount of miner.
It will start the master node with the port `3000` and every other node with
`3000 + n`, while all miner have port `4000 + n`


Now go ahead and open the explorer in a browser:
```shell
> open ./explorer/index.html
```

You should see 66 nodes and a miner (red border)

Each one of the nodes has a REST API on the corresponding port (e.g. `3001`)

Start creating live fake transactions and watch the network come alive
```shell
> crystal script/live.cr

```

## Development üë©‚Äçüíªüë®‚Äçüíª

Cocol is in a very early stage. **Expect changes, bugs and messy code.**
Test coverage sucks atm.

## Contributing Ô∏èüë∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüë∑‚Äç‚ôÇ

1. Fork it ( https://github.com/cocol-project/cocol/fork )
2. Create your feature branch (git checkout -b my-new-feature)
3. Commit your changes (git commit -am 'Add some feature')
4. Push to the branch (git push origin my-new-feature)
5. Create a new Pull Request

## Contributors

- github: [cserb](https://github.com/cserb) | twitter: [@cerbivore](http://twitter.com/cerbivore) | Cristian »òerb - creator, maintainer

def.name: run
def.body:
before_all do |env|
  env.response.content_type = "application/json"
  env.response.headers["Allow"] = "HEAD,GET,PUT,POST,DELETE,OPTIONS"
  env.response.headers["Access-Control-Allow-Origin"] = "*"
  env.response.headers["Access-Control-Allow-Headers"] = "X-Requested-With, X-HTTP-Method-Override, Content-Type, Cache-Control, Accept"
end
logging(false)
Kemal.run(port: port.to_i32, args: nil)

def.name: run
def.body:
chan = Channel(Nil).new
pending_transactions = Ledger::Mempool.pending.values
spawn do
  Ledger::Pow.mine(pending_transactions)
  chan.send(nil)
end
chan.receive
Ledger::Mempool.remove(pending_transactions)
Miner.run

def.name: start
def.body:
begin
  start_parse(argv, io)
rescue ex : ClimException
  puts("ERROR: #{ex.message}")
rescue ex : ClimInvalidOptionException | ClimInvalidTypeCastException
  puts("ERROR: #{ex.message}")
  puts("")
  puts("Please see the `--help`.")
end

constructors.name: new
constructors.args_string: (parser : Parser(OptionsForEachCommand))

def.name: run
def.body:
options = @parser.options
if options.help == true
  return RunProc.new do
    io.puts(help_template)
  end.call(options, @parser.arguments, io)
end
if options.responds_to?(:version)
  if options.version == true
    return RunProc.new do
      io.puts(version_str)
    end.call(options, @parser.arguments, io)
  end
end
RunProc.new do |opts, _args|
  if opts.miner && (!opts.address)
    puts("You need to pass an address for the block reward `--address`")
    return
  end
  if opts.host
    Node.settings.host = opts.host.as(String)
  end
  if opts.port
    Node.settings.port = opts.port.as(UInt32)
  end
  if opts.max_connections
    Node.settings.max_connections = opts.max_connections.as(UInt16)
  end
  if opts.miner
    Node.settings.miner = opts.miner
  end
  if opts.address
    Node.settings.miner_address = opts.address.as(String)
  end
  if opts.master
    Node.settings.master = opts.master
  end
  Cocol.logger.info(Node.settings.inspect)
  spawn do
    Cocol::App::Api.run(port: Node.settings.port)
  end
  if Node.settings.miner
    spawn do
      Cocol::App::Miner.run
    end
  end
  Ledger::Pow.genesis
  if !Node.settings.master
    Messenger.establish_network_position
  end
  if !Node.settings.master
    spawn do
      Ledger::Sync.call
    end
  end
  sleep
end.call(options, @parser.arguments, io)

def.name: help_macro
def.body: option "--help", type: Bool, desc: "Show this help.", default: false

constructors.name: new
constructors.args_string: (short : String, long : String, desc : String, default : String?, required : Bool)

def.name: new
def.body:
_ = allocate
_.initialize(short, long, desc, default, required)
if _.responds_to?(:finalize)
  ::GC.add_finalizer(_)
end
_

def.name: desc
def.body:
desc = @desc
if ["help", "version"].includes?("address")
  return desc
end
desc = desc + " [type:#{String.to_s}]"
if true
else
  desc = desc + " [default:#{display_default}]"
end
if required
  desc = desc + " [required]"
end
desc

def.name: set_value
def.body:
begin
  @value = arg.try do |obj|
    if obj.empty?
      next true
    end
    if (obj === "true") || (obj == "false")
    else
      raise(ClimException.new("Bool arguments accept only \"true\" or \"false\". Input: [#{obj}]"))
    end
    obj === "true"
  end
  @set_value = true
rescue ex
  raise(ClimInvalidTypeCastException.new(ex.message))
end

def.name: block
def.body: {event: "onNewBlock", hash: block.hash, previous_hash: block.previous_hash, height: block.height}

def.name: update
def.body:
update = {event: event, peers: Messenger::Repo.peers.map do |peer|
  peer.port
end, port: Node.settings.port, miner: Node.settings.miner}
latest_block = Ledger::Repo.blocks[Ledger::Util.probfin_tip_hash]
update = update.merge({height: latest_block.height, hash: latest_block.hash})
update

instance_methods.name: hash
instance_methods.doc:
Generates an `UInt64` hash value for this object.

This method must have the property that `a == b` implies `a.hash == b.hash`.

The hash value is used along with `==` by the `Hash` class to determine if two objects
reference the same hash key.

Subclasses must not override this method. Instead, they must define `hash(hasher)`,
though usually the macro `def_hash` can be used to generate this method.
instance_methods.summary: Generates an UInt64 hash value for this object.

def.name: new
def.body:

_.initialize(hash, timestamp, height, previous_hash, transactions, stakes, coinbase)
if _.responds_to?(:finalize)
  ::GC.add_finalizer(_)
end
_

def.name: call
def.body:
peer_best_block = Ledger::Repo.blocks[best_hash]?
if peer_best_block.nil?
  return Array(BlockHash).new
end
Ledger::Repo.blocks.map do |k, v|
  if v.height > peer_best_block.height
    k
  end
end.compact

def.name: add
def.body:
if pending[txn.hash]?
  return false
end
pending[txn.hash] = txn
true

def.name: remove
def.body:
case arg
when TxnHash
  if !pending[arg]?
    return false
  end
  pending.delete(arg)
  true
when Array
  arg.each do |txn|
    self.remove(txn.hash)
  end
  true
else
  false
end

def.name: add_stakers
def.body:
stakes.each do |s|
  Cocol.logger.debug("VALIDATOR ADDED: #{s.staker}")
  CCL::Pos::ValidatorPool.add(id: s.staker, timestamp: s.timestamp)
end

def.name: block_creation_loop
def.body:
Cocol.logger.info("Creation loop triggered")
threshold = 2
loop do
  sleep(0.333)
  if (pending_transactions = Ledger::Mempool.pending.values).size >= threshold
    mining_transactions = pending_transactions
    Ledger::Mempool.remove(mining_transactions)
    Ledger::Pos.mine(mining_transactions, Array(Ledger::Action::Stake).new)
    break
  end
end

def.name: genesis
def.body:
Ledger::Repo.ledger.clear
Ledger::Repo.blocks.clear
Ledger::Repo.block_at_height.clear
genesis = Ledger::Block::Pos.new(hash: "00000f33293fc3092f436fec6480ba8460589087f2118c1c2d4a60f35372f297", timestamp: 1449966000_i64, height: 0_u64, transactions: Array(Ledger::Action::Transaction).new, stakes: Array(Ledger::Action::Stake).new, previous_hash: Ledger::GENESIS_CREATOR, coinbase: Coinbase.new("3000"))
Ledger::Repo.blocks[genesis.hash] = genesis
Ledger::Repo.finalize(block: genesis.hash)
ProbFin.push(block: genesis.hash, parent: genesis.previous_hash)
new_block_if_leader

def.name: mine
def.body:
tip_hash = Ledger::Util.probfin_tip_hash
height = Ledger::Repo.blocks[tip_hash].height + 1
stakes << Ledger::Action::Stake.new(staker: Node.settings.miner_address.as(String), amount: 33_u64)
new_block = Ledger::Block::Pos.new(height: height, transactions: transactions, stakes: stakes, previous_hash: tip_hash, coinbase: Coinbase.new(Node.settings.miner_address.as(String)))
if Ledger::Repo.save(block: new_block)
  Cocol.logger.info("Height: #{new_block.height} Mined: #{new_block.hash[-7..-1]}")
  spawn(Event.broadcast((Event.block(new_block)).to_json))
  on_save(new_block)
end

def.name: new_block_if_leader
def.body:
if Node.settings.miner
  my_turn = CCL::Pos.naive_leader?(seed: Ledger::Util.probfin_tip_hash, validator_id: Node.settings.miner_address.as(String))
  Cocol.logger.debug("MY_TURN: #{my_turn}")
  if my_turn
    spawn(block_creation_loop)
  end
end

def.name: on_save
def.body:
Ledger::Mempool.remove(block.transactions)
ProbFin.push(block: block.hash, parent: block.previous_hash)
spawn do
  Messenger::Action::Base.broadcast(to: "/blocks/pos", body: block.to_json)
end
spawn(Event.broadcast((Event.update("onInitialUpdate")).to_json))
remove_validator(block.coinbase.miner)
add_stakers(block.stakes)
new_block_if_leader

def.name: validate
def.body:
if Ledger::Repo.save(block: block)
  Cocol.logger.debug("BLOCK Height: #{block.height} | Saved: #{block.hash[-7..-1]}")
  on_save(block)
end

def.name: genesis
def.body:
Ledger::Repo.ledger.clear
Ledger::Repo.blocks.clear
Ledger::Repo.block_at_height.clear
genesis = Ledger::Block::Pow.new(hash: "000003816de5a8feb130232390a28ac3566d483bde194ae6b503fec96993dffc", timestamp: 1582643058_i64, height: 0_u64, nonce: 2058209_u64, nbits: Ledger::Block::Pow::MIN_NBITS, previous_hash: "a78a4203908a94d91b1a8f6aa65f4d1176d68ba67ced10a32cfb661f40c58b88", transactions: Array(Ledger::Action::Transaction).new, coinbase: Block::Coinbase.new(miner: "Olivia", reward: 1_u64))
Ledger::Repo.blocks[genesis.hash] = genesis
Ledger::Repo.finalize(block: genesis.hash)
ProbFin.push(block: genesis.hash, parent: genesis.previous_hash)

def.name: mine
def.body:
tip_hash = Ledger::Util.probfin_tip_hash
height = Ledger::Repo.blocks[tip_hash].height + 1
if (height % 20) == 0
  difficulty = CCL::Pow::Utils.retarget(**timespan_from_tip(hash: tip_hash), wanted_timespan: RETARGET_TIMESPAN, current_target: CCL::Pow::Utils.calculate_target(from: (Ledger::Repo.blocks[tip_hash].as(Block::Pow)).nbits), min_target: Ledger::Block::Pow.min_target)
  Cocol.logger.info("New target: #{difficulty}")
else
  difficulty = (Ledger::Repo.blocks[tip_hash].as(Block::Pow)).nbits
end
new_block = Ledger::Block::Pow.new(height: height, transactions: transactions, previous_hash: tip_hash, nbits: difficulty, coinbase: Block::Coinbase.new(miner: Node.settings.miner_address.as(String)))
Cocol.logger.info("--- MINED Height: #{new_block.height} NBits: #{new_block.nbits} Block: #{new_block.hash}")
submit(new_block)
new_block

def.name: submit
def.body:
if !(Ledger::Repo.save(block))
  return
end
Cocol.logger.info("Height: #{block.height} NBits: #{block.nbits} Block: #{block.hash}")
Ledger::Mempool.remove(block.transactions)
ProbFin.push(block: block.hash, parent: block.previous_hash)
result = ProbFin.finalize(from: Ledger::Repo.ledger.last)
if result.class == BlockHash
  Ledger::Repo.finalize(result.as(BlockHash))
end
if broadcast
  spawn do
    Messenger::Action::Base.broadcast(to: "/blocks/pow", body: block.to_json)
  end
  spawn(Event.broadcast((Event.update("onInitialUpdate")).to_json))
  spawn(Event.broadcast((Event.block(block)).to_json))
end

def.name: finalize
def.body:
finalized_block = self.blocks[hash]
if self.block_at_height[finalized_block.height]?
  return false
end
self.ledger << hash
self.block_at_height[finalized_block.height] = hash
true

def.name: save
def.body:
if self.blocks[block.hash]?
  return false
end
self.blocks[block.hash] = block
true

def.name: call
def.body:
Cocol.logger.info("--- START SYNC")
loop do
  sleep(0.5)
  if Messenger::Repo.peers.size == 0
    next
  end
  peer = Messenger::Repo.peers.first
  best_hash = Ledger::Util.probfin_tip_hash
  peer_inventory = Messenger::Action::Inventory.call(peer: peer, best_hash: best_hash)
  if peer_inventory.size == 0
    break
  end
  my_inventory = Ledger::Inventory.call(best_hash)
  inventory = peer_inventory - my_inventory
  inventory.each do |bh|
    if Ledger::Repo.blocks[bh]?
      next
    end
    block = Messenger::Action::GetBlock.call(block_hash: bh, peer: peer)
    if !Ledger::Pow.valid?(block: block)
      next
    end
    Ledger::Pow.submit(block, broadcast: false)
  end
end
Cocol.logger.info("--- SYNC FINISHED")

instance_methods.name: balance
instance_methods.args_string: (for address : String, until block_hash : String) : Int64

def.name: balance
def.body:
tip = probfin_tip_hash
balance(for: address, until: tip)

def.name: signature_valid?
def.body:
txn_sig = txn.sig.as(Ledger::Action::Signature)
r = BigInt.new(txn_sig.r)
s = BigInt.new(txn_sig.s)
sig = Secp256k1::ECDSASignature.new(r: r, s: s)
pubdc = Secp256k1::Util.decode_compressed_public_key(txn_sig.v)
Secp256k1::Signature.verify(txn.hash, sig, pubdc)

def.name: valid?
def.body:
if !(signature_valid?(transaction))
  return false
end
if transaction.amount == 0
  return false
end
allowed_amount = balance(for: transaction.from, until: block)
allowed_amount >= transaction.amount

def.name: valid?
def.body:
tip = probfin_tip_hash
valid?(transaction: transaction, at: tip)

def.name: establish_network_position
def.body:
config = Totem.from_file("./config.yml")
master = config.mapping(Messenger::Struct::Peer, "master")
Messenger::Action::Handshake.call(peer: master)
peers = Messenger::Action::GetPeers.call(peer: master)
peers = peers.reject! do |p|
  p.ident == Node.settings.ident
end
Messenger::Repo.known_peers.concat(peers)
(peers.sample(Messenger.free_slots)).each do |peer|
  sleep(1)
  if Node.settings.ident == peer.ident
    next
  end
  if (  handshake = Messenger::Action::Handshake.call(peer)).nil?
    next
  end
  if handshake.status_code != 200
    next
  end
  Messenger::Repo.peers.add(peer)
end

def.name: free_slots
def.body:
free = Node.settings.max_connections - Messenger::Repo.peers.size
if free < 0
  return 0_u16
end
free.to_u16

def.name: broadcast
def.body:
Messenger::Repo.peers.each do |peer|
  uri = peer_uri(from: peer)
  uri.path = endpoint
  post(to: uri, body: body)
end

def.name: get
def.body:
client = HTTP::Client.new(uri)
begin
  response = client.get(path: uri.path, headers: HTTP::Headers {"Content-Type" => "application/json", "X-Node-Id" => Node.settings.ident.to_s})
  client.close
  response
rescue
  Cocol.logger.warn("Peer is not responding at GET-#{uri}")
  nil
end

def.name: post
def.body:
client = HTTP::Client.new(uri)
begin
  response = client.post(path: uri.path, headers: HTTP::Headers {"Content-Type" => "application/json", "X-Node-Id" => Node.settings.ident.to_s}, body: body)
  client.close
  response
rescue
  Cocol.logger.warn("Peer is not responding at POST-#{uri}")
  nil
end

def.name: call
def.body:
uri = peer_uri(from: peer)
uri.path = PATH.gsub(":hash", block_hash)
response = get(from: uri)
Ledger::Block::Pow.from_json((response.as(HTTP::Client::Response)).body)

def.name: call
def.body:
uri = peer_uri(from: peer)
uri.path = PATH
response = get(from: uri)
if response.nil?
  return Array(Messenger::Struct::Peer).new
end
Array(Messenger::Struct::Peer).from_json(response.body)

def.name: call
def.body:
payload = Messenger::Struct::Peer.new(**Node.settings.peer_info)
uri = peer_uri(from: peer)
uri.path = PATH
post(to: uri, body: payload.to_json)

def.name: call
def.body:
uri = peer_uri(from: peer)
uri.path = PATH.gsub(":best_hash", best_hash)
response = get(from: uri)
Array(BlockHash).from_json((response.as(HTTP::Client::Response)).body)
